Package org.gradle.tooling.model

Interface Launchable

All Superinterfaces:
ProjectModel
All Known Subinterfaces:
GradleTask, Task, TaskSelector
public interface Launchable extends ProjectModel
Represents an object that can be used to launch a Gradle build, such as a task.

To launch a build, you pass one or more Launchable instances to either BuildLauncher.forTasks(Iterable) or BuildLauncher.forLaunchables(Iterable).

Since:
1.12

    • isPublic

      boolean isPublic()
      Returns whether launchable is public or not. A public launchable is one that is considered a public 'entry point' to the build, that is interesting for an end user of the build to run.
      Returns:
      Public property.
      Since:
      2.1
